Text:
Always search the index before uploading to avoid duplicates with no clear advantage for users.

http://thepiratebay.se/search/elementary%20statistics%20world/0/99/600

Duplication is the cancer of low volume torrents.
Sorry if I infringed any "uploadrights". Anyway, I don't think that repetition is in detriment of the torrents' health. Of course, without statistical analysis about it, this are just opinions.
